roleset.name: induced by a doctor's words or actions
roleset.note: IATROGENIC-J NOTES: Added automatically by Julia. (from iatrogenic.01-j)

example.text: Many biological psychiatrists who base their practices around medication management will tell you the condition doesn't exist, or that if it exists it is "iatrogenic," meaning it is caused by therapists training their patients to interpret their symptoms as if they have a whole set of distinct personalities.
